medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Ms A first felt seriously depressed in her 20s, experiencing intermittent worsening and improvement over the years, eventually reaching a point of suicidal ideation during periods of uncontrolled crying. She has engaged in numerous antidepressant trials with limited efficacy.
medical_history.family_history: There is a history of troubled family life and possible abuse in childhood; her daughter experienced difficulties during her teens but is currently doing well and is close to the patient.
medical_history.social_history: Ms A is a 60-year-old unemployed widow, lives in urban housing with her mother, has public insurance, has never smoked, consumed alcohol infrequently, and has not used illicit drugs.
